title: How to Know when Scones Are Baked

steps.title: Compare the time with the time suggested by the recipe.
steps.content: Compare the time with the time suggested by the recipe . Has adequate time passed yet? If not, and you think they might be ready, check to reassure yourself.

steps.title: Look at the tops of the scones.
steps.content: Look at the tops of the scones . They should have browned slightly.

steps.title: Tap the scones.
steps.content: Tap the scones. If they're baked , they will sound hollow. Use the top of your fingers for this.

steps.title: Insert a skewer or toothpick into the scone.
steps.content: Insert a skewer or toothpick into the scone. If it comes out clean, the scone is ready. If it comes out with dough on it, the scones need a little more cooking time.
